name: Safari Venture
description: Help zoologist Erwin to track down evil poachers and save the animals of the Serengeti National Park!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows  Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel  Pentium  (or  similar  AMD)  1.5  GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 128 Mb DirectX: Version 9.0a Storage: 200 MB available space
